answers.answer: Try Lubrications, That might help or Sex in water. Water is a natural lubricant. Worth a try. :)

Performing oral sex on him before having sex could also help. Saliva is a natural lubricant. Look for a product that is both a vaginal moisturizer and a lubricant so you can use it for daily use and for sex. Unscented and unflavored is the best especially if you use it daily.

question: My husband has a 9 and a half size penis n it is thick from the tip to the bottom. it is very huge. title: very dry vagina
